plays.text: Goal scored by Kris Draper assisted by Darren McCarty and Chris Chelios
Penalty to Dean McAmmond 2 minutes for Roughing Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Holding Dean McAmmond
Penalty to Jason Woolley 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Riku Hahl
Penalty to Jeff Shantz 2 minutes for Hooking Brett Hull
Penalty to Alex Tanguay 2 minutes for Tripping(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Tripping Milan Hejduk
Goal scored by Mathieu Dandenault assisted by Kirk Maltby and Nicklas Lidstrom
Penalty to Serge Aubin 2 minutes for Boarding Sean Avery
Goal scored by Peter Forsberg assisted by Greg de Vries and Joe Sakic
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Roughing Peter Forsberg
Goal scored by Dan Hinote assisted by Serge Aubin and Dean McAmmond
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan unassisted
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Brett Hull and Sergei Fedorov
